## AesCtr.encrypt() method

Encrypts the provided data using AES-CTR.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static encrypt(options: {
        counter: Uint8Array;
        data: Uint8Array;
        key: Uint8Array;
        length: number;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { counter: Uint8Array; data: Uint8Array; key: Uint8Array; length: number; } | The options for the encryption operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the encrypted data as a Uint8Array.
